channel.title: CVE Feed for Optemiz -- XPlainer - WooCommerce Product FAQ
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Optemiz -- XPlainer - WooCommerce Product FAQ

item.title: CVE-2024-37515|2024-08-02T03:57:39.552Z -- optemiz -- xplainer%20-%20woocommerce%20product%20faq
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Optemiz XPlainer - WooCommerce Product FAQ allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects XPlainer - WooCommerce Product FAQ: from n/a through 1.6.3.
